subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r23256 - in
	branches/SAMBA_3_0_26/source/libads: .
body:

> Author: jerry

>
> Log:
> fix length and siglen checks in pac_io_pac_signature_data()
> Modified:
>   branches/SAMBA_3_0_26/source/libads/authdata.c

Shouldn't this be in SAMBA_3_0 as well?

--
James Peach | jpeach@samba.org
